lead_paragraph: RECEPTION OF KOSSUTH.--Special Meting of the Common Council.--A petition, numerously signed, was yesterday presented to his Honor Mayor Brush, asking that a special meeting of the Common Council might be called for the purpose of making suitable arrangements to welcome the exile patriot, KOSSUTH, on his arrival in this country. Agreeably to this request, a meeting of the Board was convened at the Mayor's office last evening, his Honor presiding.
